channel.title: Bioconductor on R-Ladies Global
channel.description: Recent content in Bioconductor on R-Ladies Global

item.title: New R-Ladiesâ€“Bioconductor collaboration!
item.description: We are excited to share a new collaboration between R-Ladies and Bioconductor, two global communities committed to building diverse developer communities around the world. R-Ladies is a worldwide organization whose mission is to promote gender diversity in the R community.
